trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for a Web server control <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para um controlo de servidor Web <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: WebControlToolboxItem provides a base class for toolbox items that create Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: WebControlToolboxItem fornece uma classe base para itens de caixa de ferramentas que criar controlos de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: This class extends <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and provides the following additional methods: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> gets the value of an attribute of the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe expande <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>e fornece os seguintes métodos adicionais:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A>obtém o valor de um atributo do item de caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A> gets the HTML that represents the initial state of the control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A>obtém HTML que representa o estado inicial do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A> gets the type of the associated runtime component.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A>obtém o tipo de componente de runtime associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>está definido para uma versão abreviada do nome de tipo.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class using the provided type.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"> </xref> classe utilizando o tipo fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>está definido para uma versão abreviada do nome de tipo.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the tool for this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>da ferramenta para este item de caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class using the provided <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"> </xref> classe utilizando fornecido <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: A SerializationInfo object containing information needed to instantiate the Web control through deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Um objecto SerializationInfo que contêm informações necessárias para instanciar o controlo Web através de anulação da serialização.

trans-unit.source: A StreamingContext object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de StreamingContext.

trans-unit.source: Creates objects from each type contained in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>, and adds them to the specified designer.
trans-unit.target: Cria objetos a partir de cada tipo contido neste <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>e adiciona-o para o estruturador especificado.

trans-unit.source: CreateComponentsCore always throws an exception, indicating that the method is inherited from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and only intended for use with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: CreateComponentsCore sempre emite uma exceção, que indica que o método é herdado a partir <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>e apenas concebidos para utilização com o Windows Forms.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para o documento de estrutura atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The CreateComponentsCore method is only available in Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateComponentsCore só está disponível no Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the toolbox item from the specified serialization information object.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado do item de caixa de ferramentas do objeto de informações de serialização especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that describes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que descreve o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica as características de sequência de serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified type of attribute of the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do tipo do atributo o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the `attributeType` parameter is anything other than a <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida irá gerar um <xref:System.ArgumentException>se o `attributeType` parâmetro é tudo o que não seja um <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.</xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> </xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para o documento de estrutura atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to retrieve the value of.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de atributo para obter o valor de.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified type of attribute.
trans-unit.target: O valor do tipo do atributo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The attributeType parameter is not a .
trans-unit.target: The attributeType parameter is not a .

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML para o controlo Web que a ferramenta cria.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para o documento de estrutura atual.

trans-unit.source: The HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
trans-unit.target: HTML para o controlo Web que a ferramenta cria.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo deste item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para o documento de estrutura atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>deste item de caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes this toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa este item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the Web server control toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do item de caixa de ferramentas de controlo de servidor Web.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o estado do item de caixa de ferramentas para o objeto de informações de serialização especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> used to save the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> utilizada para guardar o estado do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica as características de sequência de serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
